quest_giver.name: Elara Moonwhisper
quest_giver.location: The Blackened Hearth Inn, Oakwood Village
quest_giver.motivation: Her village is plagued by strange occurrences and her family's sacred tree has withered

clues.meaning: The shrine was once a place of great power, but now it seems to be drawing the life force from the forest
There are strange symbols etched into the trees surrounding the shrine, pulsing with a dark energy
The tree's withering is connected to an ancient curse placed on the land by a rival village

solution.description: To lift the curse, the party must uncover the identity of the rival village and retrieve their artifact, which can only be accessed through the shrine
red_herrings: A group of bandits are hiding in the nearby woods
The symbols on the trees seem to be a warning, not a clue

final_boss.name: Korvus, the Cursed One
final_boss.trait: A twisted version of the rival village's leader, with dark magic abilities

final_challenge.conclusion_action: Elara must use her family tree to unlock the artifact and break the curse
